content: सो {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्यति, ससौ, असात्-असासीत्, सास्यति, सातुं, सित; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} साययति-ते, {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} सिषासति; {%<ab>pass.</ab>%} सीयते; the स् of सो is changed to ष् after prepositions ending in इ or उ) {@--1@} To kill, destroy. {@--2@} To finish, complete, bring to an end.
